nodes.text: Merchant Row was an area located aboard Outland Transit Station, a large space station in the Baxel sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim. Made up of a number of crowded streets and alleyways, Merchant Row was home to various salespeople attempting to sell their wares to potential customers.

Outland Transit Station's Merchant Row was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the 2002 Star Wars: Bounty Hunter video game, developed and published by LucasArts. The area later recieved an informational entry in the 2008 reference guide The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
